Tracker Hatuba:
There are two important things.
The first is to destroy the undead in the Dead Forest.
After the murder of von Gelmanov Dead in the Woods appeared a lot of undead. I've never seen so many living dead. So you need to understand the causes of this phenomenon.
The second case - study of gravestones in the South of the Cursed village.
There's a tombstone where almost no one comes. Do not you think it strange? I think it needs to be checked.
